text: Afrocanthium kilifiense is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Kenya. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Canthium kilifiensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Vanguerieae Category:Endemic flora of Kenya Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Afrocanthium kilifiense
